name: Ghoulish Garden
description:
CONQUER THE GARDEN

Callie Bossa has been issued a challenge: Obtain the Pumpkin Orb from deep within a treacherous garden maze, and gain incredible power. This garden is teeming with monstrous ghouls tasked with guarding this orb from any and all intruders. But Callie is determined to outsmart these baddies and obtain this powerful orb for herself.

It's time to enter...the Ghoulish Garden.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
NOTICE: This project has been cancelled! Only 11 of the 30 planned stages are available, and not all spritework was completed. No sounds are present. Trying to access any stage past stage 11 will load stage 1's layout.

I was not liking how development was proceeding with this project. So instead of trying to make further attempts to make it work, I've chosen to scrap it. I may revisit some of its ideas in a future project.

Controls are taught as you play, but I will list them here for convenience.
Arrow Keys - Move
X - Place Bombs (once picked up)
C - Kick Rocks (if standing in front of one)
